SliceSimplexGeometry Class

Extends AxialSimplexPrimitivesBuilder
Defined in: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SliceSimplexGeometry.ts:37
Module: geometries
Parent Module: EIGHT

Calls the base class constructor.

Provides the axis to the AxialSimplexPrimitivesBuilder base class.

Provides the type to the AxialSimplexPrimitivesBuilder base class.

Constructor

SliceSimplexGeometry

(
  • [axis = e3]
  • [sliceStart]
  • [sliceAngle = 2 * Math.PI]
)

Defined in src/davinci-eight/geometries/SliceSimplexGeometry.ts:37

Parameters:

  • [axis = e3] VectorE3 optional

    The axis property.

  • [sliceStart] VectorE3 optional

    The sliceStart property.

  • [sliceAngle = 2 * Math.PI] Number optional

    The sliceAngle property.

Methods

boundary

(
  • [times]
)
SimplexPrimitivesBuilder

Inherited from SimplexPrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexPrimitivesBuilder.ts:146

Applies the boundary operation to each Simplex in this instance the specified number of times.

The boundary operation converts simplices of dimension n to n - 1. For example, triangles are converted to lines.

Parameters:

  • [times] Number optional

    Determines the number of times the boundary operation is applied to this instance.

Returns:

SimplexPrimitivesBuilder:

isModified

() Boolean

Inherited from SimplexPrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexPrimitivesBuilder.ts:121

Used to determine whether the geometry must be recalculated. The base implementation is pessimistic and returns true. This method should be implemented by the derived class to reduce frequent recalculation.

Returns:

Boolean:

if the parameters defining the geometry have been modified.

subdivide

(
  • [times]
)
SimplexPrimitivesBuilder

Inherited from SimplexPrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexPrimitivesBuilder.ts:180

Applies the subdivide operation to each Simplex in this instance the specified number of times.

The subdivide operation creates new simplices of the same dimension as the originals.

Parameters:

  • [times] Number optional

    Determines the number of times the subdivide operation is applied to this instance.

Returns:

SimplexPrimitivesBuilder:

Properties

_k

Number private

Inherited from SimplexPrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexPrimitivesBuilder.ts:43

The dimensionality of the simplices in this geometry.

_position

CartesianE3 private

Inherited from PrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/PrimitivesBuilder.ts:20

axis

CartesianE3

Inherited from AxialSimplexPrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/AxialSimplexPrimitivesBuilder.ts:17

The symmetry axis used for geometry generation.

curvedSegments

Number

Inherited from SimplexPrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexPrimitivesBuilder.ts:51

Specifies the number of segments to use in curved directions.

data

Simplex[]

Inherited from SimplexPrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexPrimitivesBuilder.ts:27

The geometry as a list of simplices. A simplex, in the context of WebGL, will usually represent a triangle, line or point.

flatSegments

Number

Inherited from SimplexPrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexPrimitivesBuilder.ts:59

Specifies the number of segments to use on flat surfaces.

k

Number

Inherited from SimplexPrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexPrimitivesBuilder.ts:93

The dimensionality of the simplices in this geometry.

The k parameter affects geometry generation.

k must be an integer.

meta

GeometryMeta

Inherited from SimplexPrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexPrimitivesBuilder.ts:35

Summary information on the simplices such as dimensionality and sizes for attributes. This data structure may be used to map vertex attribute names to program names.

orientationColors

Boolean

Inherited from SimplexPrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/SimplexPrimitivesBuilder.ts:67

Specifies that the geometry should set colors on vertex attributes for visualizing orientation of triangles

position

CartesianE3

Inherited from PrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/PrimitivesBuilder.ts:41

The local position property used for geometry generation.

sliceAngle

Number

Defined in src/davinci-eight/geometries/SliceSimplexGeometry.ts:21

The angle of the slice, measured in radians.

sliceStart

R3

Defined in src/davinci-eight/geometries/SliceSimplexGeometry.ts:29

The (unit vector) direction of the start of the slice.

Boolean

Inherited from PrimitivesBuilder: src/davinci-eight/geometries/PrimitivesBuilder.ts:27
